about_the_game:
A 2D action adventure platformer with a simple sword combat and permadeath, it offers,

- One big level to explore.
- Collectibles to be found that contain's lore.
- Many Enemies to fight.
- Magic power up.
- Secrets.
- Hidden Puzzle to solve.

Story

In a world full of wonders, a new Star is shining, a young soul full of hope, dreams and adventure.

The Royal Sorcerer Isvada kidnapped the rightful heir after the King's mysterious death and caused the Kingdom to fall into Chaos.
You became the Wanderer set to achieve your dreams and save your homeland from the evil wizard by being brave and going into your first Adventure.

More

This is part 1 out of 3 short games as follows,

1- New Star.
2- Evil Shadows.
3- Stars Collide.

Contain Achievements.
Fully Playable using controller.

Controls

Walk -
Keyboard / Arrow Keys
Controller / D-Pad
Jump -
Keyboard / Spacebar
Controller / X on DualShock 4
Attack -
Keyboard / A Key
Controller / Square on DualShock 4
Magic -
Keyboard / D Key
Controller / Circle on DualShock 4
Interact -
Keyboard / W Key
Controller / Triangle on DualShock 4
Reset after Death -
Keyboard / S Key
Controller / R1 on Dualshock 4
Pause -
Keyboard / Enter Key
Controller / Options on DualShock 4

Note! DualShock4 was used as a sample for a generic controller so the same applies for Xbox controller or any controller with the same layout.
To use connect the controller via bluetooth and it should work.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i5-4200U 1.60GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nividia GeForce 820M/Any
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-6700HQ @ 2.60GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nividia GeForce GTX 960M
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Wandervania is a short action adventure game similar to the Classic Castlevania games, a big one level with collectibles and lore to go through.
